lines.text: I'm sorry Jim... I didn't want this to happen.
You're still my best and only friend.

[narrating]
They were real nice, once they decided not to kill me.
You're the best friend I ever had, Jim.
You're the only friend I ever had...

[Jim appears wearing a silly African costume and looks disgusted]
What in hell's bells are you supposed to be?
The King said I was a Swahili warrior. He even taught me some Swahili or what he said was Swahili. Sounded like a pig in heat to me.
We've even invented something to remove tartar off your teeth... unfortunately, the enamel goes right along with it.
So kick off yer shoes, if yer wearin' em', and git ready for a spit-lickin' good time!
Ah, Hells Bells, Jim, I almost puked up my livers!
And she got to talking about this, and about that, and blah-di, blah-di, blah until I wanted to wring her scrawny little neck! But by and by, she got to talkin' about the murder.
But I'm... I'm your next of kin... and you're my little angel.
Now where have you been, you little turd pie? Hmm?
Just playing with the damn dog next door.
Oh, just playing with the little doggies, is it? Why, I outta... Just stay right here today, understand?
